page.description: Should the data be sorted on the break field? If the data is already in the correct order then you can turn this property off.

section.description: You can sort on a break field such that all of the identical values in a break field will be grouped together. For example, here we have defined a set of static data containing city names and corresponding code numbers between 1 and 3.
When the 'Code' field is set as the Break field and the 'Sort on break field' is not checked, running the component produces the following:
When the 'Sort on break field' is checked the break field will appear sorted.
section.note: Having trailing empty spaces in the static data will alter the sort on break field results.
